title: Draft Responses to Interrogatories
description: A litigation associate must draft responses to a set of written interrogatories (questions) served by the opposing party.

tasks.description: Review the interrogatories and identify the information being sought.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands each question being asked.

tasks.description: Consult with the client and review case documents to gather the information needed to answer the questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the factual basis for the answers.

tasks.description: Draft responses to each interrogatory, including any valid objections (e.g., 'vague and ambiguous', 'seeks privileged information').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a set of draft responses and objections for attorney review.
